## checkConditions() function

Checks the provided list of conditions against a message.

`allowed` is true if all conditions are satisfied.

`message` is the message of the first failed condition if all failed conditions have messages, otherwise undefined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function checkConditions(context: CommandContextResolvable, conditions: CommandCondition[]): string | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  context | [CommandContextResolvable](./noisecord.commandcontextresolvable.md) |  |
|  conditions | [CommandCondition](./noisecord.commandcondition.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |

**Returns:**

string \| null
